title: Kalista Ultimate
body:
Is it possible to reapply your bound spear? Did a google search, said to get another spear from shop, wait for your ulti to be on cd and you can reapply it on a champ... tried it so many different ways nothing worked...

So can you if at all, rebind a different champ?

replies.body:
